name: ポップスター
description: 音楽チャートだろうと、戦いだろうと、ポップスターは誰にも止められない。

skins.name: ポップスター アーリ

wikiSkinData.lore: Discovered by her record label when she was still a teen, Ahri took the music world by storm when her first five singles hit the Top 100, winning Most Talented New K-pop Artist at the 2013 Pop Shine Awards. She's been stealing hearts and sweeping awards ever since. However, underneath that perfect exterior, Ahri is feeling trapped by increasing demands...
